Request

POST /user/
Content-Type: application/json
{
    "specific_permissions": {
        "invoicing_access": false
    }, 
    "email": "nobody1@vosae.com", 
    "groups": [
        "/api/v1/group/5231cbd54ab63c53dc900473/"
    ], 
    "settings": {}
}

  <specific_permissions type="hash">

  </specific_permissions>
  <settings type="hash"/>
</object>
